goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 663kB)
indicator_name: Proportion of small-scale industries with a loan or line of credit
target_name: 소규모 산업체의 가치사슬 및 시장으로의 통합 및 금융서비스 접근가능성 강화(특히 개도국)
page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
title: Proportion of small-scale industries with a loan or line of credit
target: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets
un_notes: Fast Track; Reviewed at 5th IAEG-SDG meeting; Request additional work on the definition of small-scale industries
